I've made the following changes to the `AddPlaylistView.vue` file:

1. Added a `success` ref to track the success state
2. Removed the redirect to `/playlists` after successful playlist addition
3. Added a success notification message that appears when the playlist is added successfully
4. Reset the form fields after successful submission
5. Added styling for the success message with a green color scheme

Now when you add a playlist:
1. The form will be submitted
2. On success, you'll see a green notification message saying "Playlist added successfully!"
3. The form will be reset to its initial state
4. You'll stay on the same page instead of being redirected
